struct  sBuffer_t

Definition at line 123 of file VLIB_tiler.h.

#define SET_TILE_TYPE ( flag,
type   ) 

Value:

{\
        uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_TYPE_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
        uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS);\
        flag = flag & mask;\
        flag = flag | (type << TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS);\
    }

Definition at line 125 of file VLIB_tiler.h.

#define SET_TILE_CH ( flag,
ch   ) 

Value:

{\
        uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_CH_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
        uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_CH_BIT_POS);\
        flag = flag & mask;\
        flag = flag | (ch << TILE_CH_BIT_POS);\
    }

Definition at line 133 of file VLIB_tiler.h.

#define SET_TILE_CONTIGUOUS ( flag,
contiguous   ) 

Value:

{\
        uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
        uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS);\
        flag = flag & mask;\
        flag = flag | (contiguous << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS);\

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum eTileTypes_t

This enum defines the data type of the flags parameter in the sBuffer_t.

Parameters:
TILE_TYPE_8U Unsigned 8 bit
TILE_TYPE_8S Signed 8 bit
TILE_TYPE_16U Unsigned 16 bit
TILE_TYPE_16S Signed 16 bit
TILE_TYPE_32U Unsigned 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_32S Signed 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_32F Floating point 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_64F Floating point 64 bit
TILE_TYPE_MAX Max enumeration
Enumerator:
TILE_TYPE_8U  Unsigned 8 bit
TILE_TYPE_8S  Signed 8 bit
TILE_TYPE_16U  Unsigned 16 bit
TILE_TYPE_16S  Signed 16 bit
TILE_TYPE_32U  Unsigned 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_32S  Signed 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_32F  Floating point 32 bit
TILE_TYPE_64F  Floating point 64 bit
TILE_TYPE_MAX  Max enumeration
